getCityInfo

public java.lang.String[] getCityInfo(int index)
Gets the information about a given city. The city is determined by its index in the citiesList. It returns all the information needed by the UI in a String array

Parameters:
index - The index of the city
Returns:
String of information needed by the UI with the following format: [0]=name, [1]=techLevel, [2]=politicalSystem, [3]=distance

getCityInfo

public java.lang.String[] getCityInfo(City city)
Returns the information about a city which is passed in as a parameter.

Parameters:
city - City who's information is being returned
Returns:
String of information needed by the UI with the following format: [0]=name, [1]=techLevel, [2]=politicalSystem, [3]=distance

getPlayerStatInfo

public java.lang.String[] getPlayerStatInfo()
Grabs the necessary information for the UI from the player and packages it in a String array. The information is as follows(from index 0 to 7):communicationSkills, fighterSkills, driverSkills, dealerSkills, currentCity, playerHealth, playerName, playerMoney

Returns:
Returns an array of player information for the UI

marketToPlayer

public java.lang.String marketToPlayer(java.lang.String drug,
                                       int quantity)
This method transfers goods from the market to the player. This means the player gains goods and loses money and the Market loses goods and gains money. If the player attempts to buy more goods than are available or exceeds his/her money then a string of the error is returned. If the transaction is valid then null is returned and all appropriate information is updated

Parameters:
drug - String of the drug to be transfered
quantity - Quantity of the drug to be transfered
Returns:

playerToMarket

public java.lang.String playerToMarket(java.lang.String drug,
                                       int quantity)
This method transfers goods from the player to the market. This means the market gains goods and loses money and the player loses goods and gains money. If the player attempts to sell more goods than are available or exceeds the markets money then a string of the error is returned. If the transaction is valid then null is returned and all appropriate information is updated

Parameters:
drug - String of the drug to be transfered
quantity - Quantity of the drug to be transfered
Returns:
